    Class
    Description
    final class 
    ExactSolver<T>

    SequentialSolver<T>
    A sequential implementation of a Branch-and-Bound solver based on Multi-valued Decision Diagrams (MDDs).

  • Uses of Solver in org.ddolib.util.debug

    Method parameters in org.ddolib.util.debug with type arguments of type Solver
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static <T> void
    DebugUtil.checkFlbAdmissibility(Set<StateAndDepth<T>> toCheck, Model<T> model, Function<StateAndDepth<T>,Solver> solver)
    Given a set of states check if the FastLowerBound is admissible, i.e., whether the bound does not overestimate the path from the states to a terminal node.
